text: Aap say yahud-o-nasaaraa hergiz razi nahi hongay jab tak kay aap inn kay mazaahib kay tabey na bann jayen aap keh dijiye kay Allah ki hidayat hi hidayat hai aur agar aap ney apney pass ba wajood ilm aajaney kay phir inn ki khuwaishon ki pairwee ki to Allah kay pass aap ka na to koi wali hoga aur na madadgar
